title: Did the U.S. Republic Omar say that she " hates living in America, " was she" better off " in the refugee camp?
subtitle: The initial criticism of aspects of an individual ' s life in a country is not the same as the expression of hatred.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The U.S. Republic of Elhan Omar once said that she hated living in the United States and was better off in a refugee camp in Kenya (or words to that effect).
